EmailTemplate.name: DM-2018-10-22 Steak Pads.ES-20181022-Steak pad follow up.Email- Steak Mailer
EmailTemplate.subject: {{lead.First Name:default=}}, Last Chance -- Don't Make a Mis-STEAK
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
I am following up with you one last time to see if you received the steak pad we sent a few weeks back.
Don't make a mis-STEAK -- this is your last chance to receive a custom meat package from Omaha Steaks in exchange for 30-minutes of your time! We'd love to share why 2000+ CIOs and companies of all sizes and industries are trusting Turbonomic to optimize their environments both on-premise and in the cloud.
Do you have 30 minutes in the next two weeks? If so, simply respond to this email with your preferred date and time -- and I'll have a chance to apologize for my terrible pun.
Looking forward to hearing from you soon!
Sincerely,
Erica Price
Field Marketing Program Manager
